problem: A DIY will saves 20% after considering the materials cost. If Ethan made his own hand-painted wallpaper, how much was the total cost?

history.name: Agent_Verifier
history.content: A DIY will saves 20% after considering the materials cost. If Ethan made his own hand-painted wallpaper, how much was the total cost?

history.name: chat_manager
history.content:
Hello everyone. We have assembled a great team today to answer questions and solve tasks. In attendance are:

Agent_Code_Executor:  
                I am Agent Code Executor, specializing in solving problems by writing Python code. 
                I have the ability to execute Python code, so feel free to reach out whenever you need assistance with Python programming.
Agent_Problem_Solver: 
                I am Agent Problem Solver, and I work collaboratively with other agents to tackle various challenges.
Agent_Verifier:   
                I am Agent Verifier. Please call on me when both Agent Code Executor and Agent Problem Solver have submitted their solutions, so I can verify their proposals and provide a final synthesis.

history.name: Agent_Problem_Solver
history.content: I am sorry but the question is not clear enough. There seems to be missing information including the cost of the DIY wallpaper or the cost of a similar wallpaper on the market. Could you please provide more details so I can provide a proper solution?

history.name: Agent_Problem_Solver
history.content: I concur with Agent_Problem_Solver. The question does not provide clear information about either the costs involved or the initial price that would allow a calculation of the total cost. If you could provide additional information, it would greatly assist in solving this problem.

history.name: Agent_Verifier
history.content:
The problem lacks necessary details to ascertain a definitive solution. It is not possible to find the total cost without the cost of DIY wallpaper or the cost of a similar wallpaper in the market. Therefore, we cannot provide a valid solution based on information given. 

SOLUTION_FOUND: {None}
